data.title: Original Billy Two Hats (1974) movie poster in C8 condition for $45.00
data.meta_description: Original  movie poster for BILLY TWO HATS (1974) 30844 Movie Poster  Gregory Peck  Desi Arnaz, Jr.  Jack Warden  David Huddleston  Dawn Little Sky  Henry Medicine Hat  Ted Kotcheff Original U.S. One-Sheet Poster (27x41) Folded  Theater Used  Fine Condition Offered by Kirby McDaniel MovieArt of Austin, Texas.
data.text:
Original U.S. One-Sheet Poster (27x41) Folded Theater Used Fine Condition

United Artists Original U.S. One-Sheet Poster, theater-used and absolutely authentic, for the Ted Kotcheff directed drama BILLY TWO HATS (1974). The film stars Gregory Peck and Desi Arnaz, Jr. They were supported by a very good cast including Jack Warden, David Huddleton, Dawn Little Sky and Henry Medicine Hat. After a bank robbery, runaway Scottish outlaw Arch Deans and his young half breed Kiowa partner Billy Two Hats develop a father-son relationship but Sheriff Henry Gifford is determined to capture or kill them. MovieArt Original Film Posters in Austin, Texas guarantees that this poster is authentic.

TED KOTCHEFF - Director

Gregory Peck - Actor

Desi Arnaz - Jr. - Actor

Jack Warden - Actor

David Huddleston - Actor

Dawn Little Sky - Actor

Henry Medicine Hat - Actor
